meanings.definition: A goal that is part of a larger goal.
meanings.sent1: She set subgoals to help her reach the big goal of running a marathon.
meanings.sent2: Breaking down the project into subgoals made it more manageable.
meanings.sent3: The subgoals in the scavenger hunt led to a surprise treasure at the end.
meanings.sent4: Each subgoal was like a stepping stone towards the ultimate achievement.
meanings.sent5: Visualizing each subgoal as a puzzle piece helped her see the bigger picture.

meanings.definition: Goals that are set to achieve a main objective.
meanings.sent1: The team worked together to accomplish their subgoals and reach the final target.
meanings.sent2: Setting subgoals along the way helped him stay focused on the end goal.
meanings.sent3: The subgoals acted like checkpoints on the path to success.
meanings.sent4: Each subgoal was a building block towards the ultimate success.
meanings.sent5: She celebrated each subgoal achieved, making the journey more rewarding.
